name: Second version of LetsWatch app, implementing wider functionalities, such as navigating through Movie lists (in addition to series), adding any choice to a watchlist in order to watch it later, navigating through popular picks of movies/series. Stack used, includes, but not limited to: React, React Hooks, React icons, Context API, Fetching from external API (The Movie Database API), Material UI for modern component architecture in addition to native styling using node-Sass.
